description.narrative: Inclusive Governance and shared identity for sustainable peace and development aimed to strengthen shared and inclusive civic identity through the promotion of a Peacebuilding Architecture.

sector.narrative: Build resilience to shocks and crisis

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative:
Outcome level Indicators: 1) Outcome Indicator 1.a: Fragile States Index (FSI) Indicators by years: 2022: FSI - 76,4; 2023: FSI – 74 2) Outcome Indicator 1.b: National Trust Index (NTI) – 43,2 (score for LSGs) Indicators by years: 2022: NTI: - 43,2; 2023: NTI - 45 3) Outcome Indicator 1.c: A sense of shared civic identity and trust increased by in target locations Indicators by years: 2022: TBD; 2023: 20%
Output level Indicators: 1) Output Indicator 1.1: Inter-Ministerial Coordination Mechanism (IMCM) for greater inclusion at all levels established and operational Indicators by years: 2022: IMCM established; 2023: IMCM operationalized 2) Output Indicator 1.2: Necessary institutional (legal, operational, financial) framework for I4P (IMCM, preventive centers, youth centers etc.) developed and adopted Indicators by years: 2022: No; 2023: Yes 3) Output Indicator 2. 1: A Data Processing Center for early warning and early response established and operational Indicators by years: 2022: No; 2023: Yes 4) Output Indicator 2.2: # of policy decisions and local development plans adopted based on gender and age sensitive analytical data and findings produced by EWER Indicators by years: 2022: No; 2023: Yes 5) Output Indicator 3.1: # of people who are aware of Kyrgyz Jarany Concept Indicators by years: 2022: 3,000; 2023: 7,000 6) Output Indicator 3.2: # people capacitated in target locations on conflict prevention, Civic Identity Kyrgyz Jarany, democratic governance, multi-cultural education, human rights, gender, freedom of religion and belief. Indicators by years: 2022: 0; 2023: 400 7) Output Indicator 3.3: # of local initiatives developed and supported for implementation Indicators by years: 2022: 4; 2023: 16

comment.narrative:
Outcome level Baselines and Targets: 1) Baseline (Outcome Indicator 1.a): FSI – 76,4 (score) Target (Outcome Indicator 1.a): FSI – 74 (score) 2) Baseline (Indicator 1.b): NTI – 43,2 (score for LSGs) Target (Indicator 1.b): NTI – 45 (score) 3) Baseline (Indicator 1.c): TBD by baseline research Target (Indicator 1.c): Increase by 20% in target locations (TBC by end-line research)
Output level Baselines and Targets: 1) Baseline (Output Indicator 1.1): No Target (Output Indicator 1.1): Yes 2) Baseline (Indicator 1.2): No Target (Indicator 1.2): Yes 3) Baseline (Output Indicator 2. 1): No Target (Output Indicator 2. 1): Yes 4) Baseline (Indicator 2.2): No Target (Indicator 2.2): 7 5) Baseline (Indicator 3.1): 0 Target (Indicator 3.1): At least 10,000 (50% female) direct beneficiaries 6) Baseline (Indicator 3.2): 0 Target (Indicator 3.2): 400 people (30% female) 7) Baseline (Indicator 3.3): 0 Target (Indicator 3.3): At least 20 initiatives

1) Target 1.1: Yes 2) Target 1.2: Yes 3) Target 2.1: Yes 4) Target 2.2: 7 5) Target 3.1: At least 10,000 (50% female) direct beneficiaries 6) Target 3.2: 400 people (30% female) 7) Target 3.3: At least 20 initiatives

1) Output Indicator 1.1: Inter-Ministerial Coordination Mechanism (IMCM) for greater inclusion at all levels established and operational - Indicators by years: 2022: IMCM established; 2023: IMCM operationalized 2) Output Indicator 1.2: Necessary institutional (legal, operational, financial) framework for I4P (IMCM, preventive centers, youth centers etc.) developed and adopted - Indicators by years: 2022: No; 2023: Yes 3) Output Indicator 2. 1: A Data Processing Center for early warning and early response established and operational - Indicators by years: 2022: No; 2023: Yes 4) Output Indicator 2.2: # of policy decisions and local development plans adopted based on gender and age sensitive analytical data and findings produced by EWER - Indicators by years: 2022: No; 2023: Yes 5) Output Indicator 3.1: # of people who are aware of Kyrgyz Jarany Concept - Indicators by years: 2022: 3,000; 2023: 7,000 6) Output Indicator 3.2: # people capacitated in target locations on conflict prevention, Civic Identity Kyrgyz Jarany, democratic governance, multi-cultural education, human rights, gender, freedom of religion and belief. - Indicators by years: 2022: 0; 2023: 400 7) Output Indicator 3.3: # of local initiatives developed and supported for implementation - Indicators by years: 2022: 4; 2023: 16
N/A for 2021 since the project implementation starts as of January 2022. The Targets for 2022 will be defined under AWP 2022
N/A for 2021 since the project implementation starts as of January 2022. The Results of 2022 will be reported end of 2022
